TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_kamaya', title = kamaya', year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/kamaya'} }

S.FORM: == kamaya' == u cidekay a kilang ku kamaya, paylumalumaan paluma i putah i tukus ku kamaya. asu' mukan ku heci. tanektek ku kilang, u matekesay a kilang kuyni. u siwkay nu nipaluma u sanek nu nipaluma malaheci tu imelang pasubana i cacudadan a lacul u zuma a cidekay a kamu, saungay misapayu' a cidekay u sulit nu zuma a kamu-Hulam atu Amilika 毛柿(學名:Diospyros strigosa) .

== kamaya' == o cidekay a kilang ko kamaya, paylomalomaan paloma i potah i tokos ko kamaya. aso' mokan ko heci. tanektek ko kilang, o matekesay a kilang koyni. o siwkay no nipaloma o sanek no nipaloma malaheci to imelang pasobana i cacodadan a lacol o zoma a cidekay a kamo, saongay misapayo' a cidekay o solit no zoma a kamo-Holam ato Amilika 毛柿(學名:Diospyros strigosa) .
